title: Fragment, 12th–14th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; linen. Wefts; linen, silk.
Technique: supplementary wft floats on a plain weave background.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 37.5 x 13.7 cm (14 3/4 x 5 3/8 in.)
description: Diagonal bands of brown silk in geometric pattern. One selvage present.
